welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Royal Leamington Spa, a charming and picturesque city known for its stunning architecture, rich history, and vibrant culture. We invite you to immerse yourself in all that our city has to offer and make unforgettable memories during your stay."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at West Midlands International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at West Midlands International Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Birmingham Airport houses all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Birmingham Airport is primarily used for low-cost airlines.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Birmingham Airport is used for some international flights and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport, with a 2-hour time limit per session.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Northampton Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Northampton Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.
